revision.text:
{{STFeature}}
int '''SystemTime'''() (Dev. 3.0 | 150831-1814)
== Usage == Returns the system time as a 32-bit signed integer timestamp. The <tt>acstime</tt> CCMD, however, can override the result of this function.
Note that due to ACS's limitations, the timestamp is suspectible to the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Year_2038_problem year 2038 problem].
== See Also == *[[GetTimeProperty]] *[[Strftime]]
